biotools.summary: Comparative Structural Alignment (CSA) is a webserver for computing and comparing protein structure alignments. Different scoring schemes are used to compute score-optimal alignments. Input is two PDB files.

bioschemas.name: CSA
bioschemas.summary: Comparative Structural Alignment (CSA) is a webserver for computing and comparing protein structure alignments. Different scoring schemes are used to compute score-optimal alignments. Input is two PDB files.
